titleStmt.title: To the Kings most excellent Majesty. The humble petition of the governor, assistants, and fellowship of Merchants-Adventurers of England.
titleStmt.author: Company of Merchant Adventurers of England.
Nicholas, Edward, Sir, 1593-1669.

notesStmt.note: Includes the reply in behalf of the King, dated: At the court at Oxford, 26. Martii, 1643, and signed: Edw. Nicholas.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
